ygData.subject: Re: Skill Caps
ygData.msgSnippet: Princess is correct. My Int is 62 and it is HELL trying to get those skills up.  Especially in a group attacking mostly Blue Dervs, an occasional even or
ygData.messageBody:
Princess is correct.
My Int is 62 and it is HELL trying to get those skills
up. Especially in a group attacking mostly Blue Dervs,
an occasional even or yellow Thug, and upper end
undead. They die too damn fast to get the hits in.
Since that patch went in a month ago that increased the
damage done by MOBS, soloing a blue can be tough if not
deadly. This is especially true in South Ro where the
Spellchucking Madmen, Dry Bones and Crypt Mummies spawn
like crazy. I can take one but I almost died to #2 if
not for a helpful fellow troll.



--
Cronik <Brethren of ill Omen>
Left Hand of Thule the Pain Bringer
14th Season Troll SK
Bertoxxulous

"Greenbloods jus be Froglok trick. Smash'm and dey
blood same color a Froglok. Me smash'm Greenblood
for Thule. Thule make Cronik big feared. Make
smash'm fun."



>From: "Princess Xaera" <xaera@...>
>
>Nothing you have should have capped at 11. My taunt and
> bash are still going strong in the late 20's
>
>You just need to be using them 24/7
>
>It also helps if you have higher INT. If you have lower
> int, it' will just take longer.
>
>
>
>Princess Xaera
>High Priestess of Innoruuk
